XenotypeDef.label: ferrkind
XenotypeDef.description:
Ferrkinds are ageless super-humans powered by archotech-created archites in the bloodstream. As a sub-xenotype of metalkins, they inherit most of their strengths. Their main distinguishing feature is the ability to copy genes from similar pawns and slowly spread this ability.
<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effect (Food):</color> Instead of food, it can be charged at charging stations.
<color=#f5ffa2>Gameplay Effect (Chimera):</color> This xenotype can copy the genes of other pawns with similar genes, and then convert unwanted genes into tools that will allow this ability to be spread.
